K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520a-1: shr'i gu hya badzra p'a ni aa bhi de sha tantra n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-0: dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba @520b bstan pa'i rgyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-1: dpal gsang ba'i bdag po la phyag 'tsha lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-3: 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-5: rig sngags kyi lha tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-6: de nas dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-7: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa ji lta bu cig lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-9: snying rjer ldan zhing shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-10: bzod dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-11: phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-12: bslab pa gsum la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-13: des ni dpa' bo yang dag 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-14: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las sgrub pa po gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-16: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di bsgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-18: dben pa nyams dga' yid 'ong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-20: dur khrod chen po 'jigs gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-21: ri gsum rtse'am brag ri sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-22: khro bo'i cha byad 'dra ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-23: de ni dpa' bo bsgrub la shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:520b-24: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las bsgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-1: pa'i dmigs pa ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-3: dang po stong zhing bdag med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-4: snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-5: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-6: de lta bu yi chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-7: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-8: mi sgom mi rtog snang la gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-9: mtha' bral mkha' mnyam dbu ma'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-10: sems kyi rang bzhin de lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-11: de ltar ma rtogs sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-12: sdug bsngal kun dang bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-13: thugs rje phyogs med bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-15: rang gis sems ni yi ge h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-17: gzhal yas khang dang lha yi gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-18: lha yi sa bon yi ge las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-19: go rims bzhin du bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-20: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-22: bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi bdag po 'di'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-24: bskyed pa'i dmigs pa thob nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-25: snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-26: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-28: dbus su nyi zla'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-29: gzhal yas khang gi nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521a-30: aa shad mar me'i rtse ltar sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-0: de la dmigs @521b pa thob nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-1: ci yang bsam par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-2: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-3: de la ye shes thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-4: gsal la rtog med rig pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-5: ye shes zhes ni de la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-6: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-8: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di'i 'khor ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-14: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga ba'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-16: bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po 'di'i rig pa ji lta bu lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-18: aom badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-19: aom badzra kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-20: aom badzra p'a ni gro dha ma h'a tsanda ro sha na h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-21: 'khor bzhi'i rig pa phul ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-22: aom badzra kro dha mah'a k'a l'a ya h'um h'um phat phat tsitta kro tsi dun dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-23: aom badzra kro dha tri lo kya bi dza ya h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-24: bam m'a ra ya tsitta rbad rbad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-25: aom badzra kro dha n'a ga sbu ga h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-26: m'a ra ya rakta rdubs rdubs rbad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-27: aom badzra kro dha ku bar h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:521b-28: m'a ra ya ke chom chom rbad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-1: brgyad kyi rig pa phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-2: mah'a de ba m'a ra ya sod sod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-3: mah'a na ga m'a ra ya sod sod dza dza:mah'a de wi m'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-5: mah'a ma ni m'a ra ya gtubs gtubs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-6: mh'a siddha m'a ra ya tishtha tishtha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-7: mah'a yaksha m'a ra ya bhinda bhinda /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-8: ma h'a tri dza m'a ra ya khos khos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-9: ma h'a ma ni bindha m'a ra ya nan nan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-11: 'khor gos sngon can lnga brgya'i rig pa phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-12: m'a ra ya ru dha ru dha h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-13: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las rig pa phul ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-15: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di'i phrin las mjug sbyin sreg gis bsdu 'tshal lam mi 'tshal ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-17: sbyin sreg ni rnam pa gsum ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-18: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-19: re re la ni bzhi bzhir bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-20: zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-21: dbang dang drag po'i sbyin sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-22: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-24: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-25: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-26: rigs kyi lha tshogs rnams dga' mgu yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522a-27: dpal chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522b-0: dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs @522b so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522b-1: rgya gar gyi pandi ta wa la tsandra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-027:522b-2: lo ts'a ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
